Posts.Content: hi, I have just recently had reconstruction  using my stomach (diep), was just wondering if someone could tell me what happens and when the nips and tucks go ahead usually, and where do they take the fat from to tweek things.
Posts.Title: stage 2 of diep

Posts.Content: HI   Thank you for the reply, I don't know what mine is, or if they have told me I did not take it in, I know there are 3 all cancerous, im having a mastectomy on the 13th and then Chemo after one I have recovered from the op How often are you having chemo is it every 3 weeks, and how are you finding it after you have had it, ??xx
Posts.Title: 30 AND JUST DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER

Posts.Content: Hi I have just been told on the 30th April I have breast cancer and im really scared I have a 3 year old, I have had to have a ct scan and waiting for my op on the 13th may so Sacred how im going to feel..   Has anybody else had to have a ct scan before there operation, I have 3 lumps in my breast all cancerous , worried about the outcome of my results this Friday.   Can anybody help calm me down?   Lucy
Posts.Title: 30 AND JUST DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER
